'''Loose Sand Piles''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Great Red Sand]], [[Sumeru]].

They can be scattered by using an {{Anemo}} attack. Loose Sand Piles covering an enemy may automatically scatter as the enemy senses the player.

==Tutorial==
{{Transclude|Tutorial/Loose Sand Piles}}

==Contents==
Scattering a Loose Sand Pile may reveal one of the following:
* [[Artifact]]{{Verify|which? what rarity?}}
* [[Dendro Crystalfly]]
* [[Masked Weasel]]
* [[Mora]]-containing [[Investigation]] point
* [[Ruins Torch]]
* [[Scorpion]]
* [[Stretchy Geo Fungus]]
* Nothing
